Package it.polimi.softeng.network.client.view.FXML_Controllers

Class GamePane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
it.polimi.softeng.network.client.view.FXML_Controllers.GamePane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GamePane extends javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is a custom FXML component controller that represents a whole game
